articles.author: David Rohde
articles.title: Trump admin's threat to suspend core U.S. legal right sparks outcry and alarm - NBC News
articles.description: Legal experts and Democrats expressed growing alarm over the weekend that Trump administration officials are openly discussing unilaterally suspending habeas corpus — a bedrock American legal right — without the approval of Congress.

articles.title: Here's what U.S. Catholics are saying about the election of Pope Leo XIV - NPR
articles.description: At services on Sunday, some Catholics took particular pride in the election of the first American pontiff, who has familial ties to multiple places across the country.
articles.content:
When Catholics across the U.S. attended Sunday services this weekend, it was the first time in history they had done so with an American pope sitting in the Vatican.
